subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Cosimo and Maria Pisani ponder the improbability of a son of Italian immigrants, Fernando Pisani, becoming the hometown hero of a rejuvenated Canadian city and its favorite hockey team.
snippet: Cosimo and Maria Pisani ponder the improbability of a son of Italian immigrants, Fernando Pisani, becoming the hometown hero of a rejuvenated Canadian city and its favorite hockey team.
